attributes.action: How taxation hits the lowest paid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before any further indirect taxes are made I suggest giving the treasury a calculator to work out what a low paid
(£10 to£15 k ) worker will have left out of his pay when all the taxes both direct and indirect,are accounted for. The answer will tell them why we can't shop our way out of this depression for the simple reason we have nothing left with which to make purchases, we can only exist by cutting all our outgoings,
most money goes on Council Tax the rest on indirect tax and we have nothing left.
Wake up to the fact please !

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
